content:
IndexBatchBase<TAction,TDoc> Class

Definition

Abstract base class for batches of upload, merge, and/or delete actions to send to the Azure Search index.

In this Article

public abstract class IndexBatchBase<TAction,TDoc> where TAction : IndexActionBase<TDoc> where TDoc : class

Type Parameters

TAction

The type of action to be contained in the batch. Must be derived from IndexActionBase.
TDoc

The CLR type that maps to the index schema. Instances of this type can be stored as documents in the index.
Inheritance
Object
IndexBatchBase<TAction,TDoc>
Derived
IndexBatch
IndexBatch<T>

Constructors

IndexBatchBase<TAction,TDoc>(IEnumerable<TAction>)

Initializes a new instance of the IndexBatchBase class.

Properties

Actions

Gets the sequence of actions in the batch.
